oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Dr. Soul Sight and Sound Disco Show Layout (17571)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Disco (Music); Layout (Printing);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on white) advertising the Dr. Soul Sight and Sound Disco Show. Poster features a metal photoplate of Dr. Soul. A typo is corrected. To see the business record associated with this poster layout, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/42471/
